pageTitle: Check if you get the severe disability premium
h1: Based on your answers, you may not be eligible for New Style ESA
p1: You cannot claim New Style ESA if you get or you’re entitled to the severe disability premium.
p2: Call Jobcentre Plus to check if you’re entitled to the severe disability premium.
inset:
Jobcentre Plus

Telephone: 0800 169 0350 (choose option 1)
Textphone: 0800 023 4888
Relay UK(if you cannot hear or speak on the phone): 18001 then 0800 169 0350
Video relay service for British Sign Language (BSL) users - check you can use the service
Welsh language telephone: 0800 012 1888
Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm
Find out about call charges
p3: If you’re not entitled to the severe disability premium, then you can apply for New Style ESA.
p4: If you’re entitled to the severe disability premium, you may be able to claim contribution-based or income-related Employment and Support Allowance instead.
